# HMPresenceEventType.lastExit

**Case**

Triggers an event when the last user leaves the home.

## Declaration

```swift
case lastExit
```

## Specifying presence type

- **HMPresenceEventType.everyEntry**: Triggers the event every time a user enters the home.
- **HMPresenceEventType.everyExit**: Triggers the event every time a user leaves the home.
- **HMPresenceEventType.firstEntry**: Triggers an event for the first user entering the home.
